content: 6 1st 3rd 5th and 7th row wrong side p to end make up 2nd row p2 k4 p1 k1 p1 k8 p1 k1 p1 k4 p2 with 2 75mm us 2 needles and c cast on 4 sts 4th row p2 c4f p1 k1 p1 k8 p1 k1 p1 c4b p2 k 3 row initial sheep 6th row p2 k4 p1 k1 p1 k8 p1 k1 p1 k4 p2 next row k2 m1 k2 5 sts with c swiss darn letters to centre of back and front see charts on 8th row p2 c4b p1 k1 p1 c8b p1 k1 p1 c4f p2 k 3 row next page next row k2 m1 k1 m1 k2 7 sts all sheep k 4 row stuff lightly and join side seams with pitch black embroider eyes cast off row cast off one st place st back on left hand needle cast and nose to face sew on face feet and tail on 3 sts cast off 7 sts place st back on left hand needle cast on 3 sts cast off 5 sts © millamia all rights reserved www millamia com
